amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Afghanistan Security Forces Fund by $2.6 billion and provides funds to reduce furloughs of Department of Defense civilian employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase Defense-wide O/M by $1 billion, while reducing funding in the Afghanistan Security Forces Fund by $2.6 billion. The reduction would be in order to give DOD more flexibility to offset civilian furloughs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
